summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 36th Ave. Southwest from Southwest Barton St. to Southwest Roxbury St.; and certain other streets and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 19322 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
